channel.title: High thoughts?
channel.description:
Martin Garrix. I thought the guy was like 25 or something but nope. He's just a kid! He's 18, just a random thought I had.
Can you imagine. How is all this happening? Like, science or religion, but like. Look how far we've come. We're still advancing. Humans. Rumors are we were apes. But look how smart we've gotten. Now we invent shit that invents it self! Like robots. Humans made robots. Robots make other robots. Shiiit. Technology is evolving. Soon we'll be able to take a shit and it'll turn into pure clean breathable air.
Speaking of air, Why is there nothing in space? Space is nothing. But like, how do we describe nothing. You can't just say there's "nothing there". What's nothing? Nothing is just empty. But how do we know it's empty. There's nothing there? Or how was everything created. If nothing was there, how is everything made? Science or Religion, how was this all made. Where did the big bang come from, where did all this start? HOW did it start? How did we name the color "red", red? Why couldn't it be called clarx? How are we attracted to boobs? Boobs is just some round squishy shit on a woman's chest. And a penis? That shit's just a hanging lump thing. Speaking of body parts, how the fuck do we have so much stuff inside of us? Like, it's not just one simple running organ, noooooo, we got like so much shit inside us. God damn.
Whatchu guys got? High/stoned thoughts? "What the fuck are you smoking, Goudont, I want some of that."

item.title: High thoughts?
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

Krackkid:

One time I was on an airplane thinking about stuff, is that what you mean by high? Or is there another meaning.

funny. You know what we mean

asyo4:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/German_submarine_U-320

Short and good to read. Quite interesting.

Usually, when we all take a dump with nothing to do, we read the back of shampoo bottles. But that’s general, high thoughts most of the time for me, are looking into each of the words and getting lost in thought lmao

Read full topic

item.title: High thoughts?
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:6, topic:545758”]I’m sure Wikipedia can answer every single question you just asked. Coincidentally, reading Wikipedia while high is great fun.

I am guessing you are young or uneducated as you seem to have no knowledge of evolution or space and time.[/quote]

Doesn’t mean I’m young haha, but that’s now on my to-do list. If I remember it.

Read full topic

item.title: High thoughts?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“goudont, post:1, topic:545758”]Martin Garrix. I thought the guy was like 25 or something but nope. He’s just a kid! He’s 18, just a random thought I had.

Can you imagine. How is all this happening? Like, science or religion, but like. Look how far we’ve come. We’re still advancing. Humans. Rumors are we were apes. But look how smart we’ve gotten. Now we invent shit that invents it self! Like robots. Humans made robots. Robots make other robots. Shiiit. Technology is evolving. Soon we’ll be able to take a shit and it’ll turn into pure clean breathable air.

Speaking of air, Why is there nothing in space? Space is nothing. But like, how do we describe nothing. You can’t just say there’s “nothing there”. What’s nothing? Nothing is just empty. But how do we know it’s empty. There’s nothing there? Or how was everything created. If nothing was there, how is everything made? Science or Religion, how was this all made. Where did the big bang come from, where did all this start? HOW did it start? How did we name the color “red”, red? Why couldn’t it be called clarx? How are we attracted to boobs? Boobs is just some round squishy shit on a woman’s chest. And a penis? That shit’s just a hanging lump thing. Speaking of body parts, how the fudge do we have so much stuff inside of us? Like, it’s not just one simple running organ, noooooo, we got like so much shit inside us. God damn.

Whatchu guys got? High/stoned thoughts?
“What the fudge are you smoking, Goudont, I want some of that.”[/quote]

I’m sure Wikipedia can answer every single question you just asked. Coincidentally, reading Wikipedia while high is great fun.

I am guessing you are young or uneducated as you seem to have no knowledge of evolution or space and time.

item.title: High thoughts?
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

Death Style:

dirty hippies

suck our hippy balls

shiiit, if our resources do go scarce even with the shit they put in our stuff, we’d be fucked. what if we find resources on another planet. what if that planet has been there for billions of years and we just never bothered to look? we are just a tiny ass spec on the giant scrotum that we haven’t explored

Read full topic

item.title: High thoughts?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Sometimes I really question how much longer the Earth really has. With all the political lies and everything, how long will it be until resources truly become scarce and the countries begin preparing to invade each other in order to survive? The odds of us finding a new host for human beings to take over is probably unlikely. It would take generations of change before we even begin to see changes in everything from water salinity, changes in global temperature, the unnecessary overpopulation of the human race, car emissions, etc. We would have to begin looking at clean, alternative fuel sources for both household and transportation, some sort of breeding restriction… But of course we as a species are unwilling to stop being greedy and work towards the longevity of our planet, because fuck the future generations right?

Read full topic

item.title: High thoughts?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Sometimes thinking of how insignificant the planet earth is fucks my mind up. Like the universe is, as far as we know, endless. And what is outside of the universe? The universe is real. Think about it… the universe is the universe, what else is there, you cant call it a name because then it has to be a subcategory of something else. Real life is this universe.

Read full topic
